trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows CheckBox.
trans-unit.target: Windows 확인란을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Use a CheckBox to give the user an option, such as true/false or yes/no.
trans-unit.target: CheckBox를 사용 하 여 같은 true/false 또는 yes/no 옵션을 사용자에 게 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CheckBox control can display an image or text or both.
trans-unit.target: CheckBox 컨트롤은 이미지, 텍스트 편집기 또는 둘 다 표시할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: CheckBox and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls have a similar function: they allow the user to choose from a list of options.
trans-unit.target: 확인란을 선택 하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>컨트롤에 비슷한 기능이: 옵션의 목록에서 선택할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: CheckBox controls let the user pick a combination of options.
trans-unit.target: 확인란 컨트롤 사용자 옵션의 조합을 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls allow a user to choose from mutually exclusive options.
trans-unit.target: 반면, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>컨트롤을 통해 사용자 상호 배타적인 옵션을 선택 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> property determines whether the CheckBox appears as a typical CheckBox or as a button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>속성 확인란 단추 또는 일반적인 확인란으로 표시 되는지 여부를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property determines whether the control supports two or three states.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>속성 컨트롤 두 개 또는 세 개의 상태를 지원 하는지 여부를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property to get or set the value of a two-state CheckBox control and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> property to get or set the value of a three-state CheckBox control.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>속성 가져오기 또는 두 가지 상태 CheckBox 컨트롤의 값을 설정 및 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>가져오거나&3; 상 확인란 컨트롤의 값을 설정할 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property will return `true` for either a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>속성이 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>속성은 반환 `true` 것인지 확인할 수 없는 상태에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property determines the style and appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>속성 유형과 컨트롤의 모양을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, 사용자의 운영 체제에는 컨트롤의 모양을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A> property is ignored and the control is displayed using the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> alignment.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A>속성이 무시 되 고 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 표시 된 <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>맞춤.</xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A> property is set to one of the right alignments, the control is displayed using the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> alignment; otherwise, it is displayed using the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> alignment.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A>오른쪽 맞춤 중 하나에 속성, 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 표시 된 <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>맞춤;를 사용 하 여 표시 되 고, 그러지는 <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>맞춤.</xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following describes an indeterminate state: You have a CheckBox that determines if the selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is bold.
trans-unit.target: 다음 설명 되지 않은 상태: 있는지 여부를 확인 하는 확인란을 선택 해야 선택한 텍스트에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>굵게 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: When you select text you can click the CheckBox to bold the selection.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 선택할 때 굵게 선택 영역에 있는 확인란을 클릭 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when you select some text, the CheckBox displays whether the selected text is bold.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 일부 텍스트를 선택할 때 확인란을 선택한 텍스트를 굵게 표시 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: If your selected text contains text that is bold and normal, the CheckBox will have an indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 텍스트에 굵게 표시 되며 일반 텍스트, 확인란 경우 알 수 없는 상태가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> is instantiated, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AutoCheck%2A> is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> is set to `false`, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>인스턴스화되면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AutoCheck%2A>로 설정 된 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>로 설정 된 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance> 로 설정 되</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> 고</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AutoCheck%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that determines the appearance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 모양을 결정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If Appearance value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> has a typical appearance.
trans-unit.target: 모양 값으로 설정 되어 있으면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>일반적인 모양이.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to `Button`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> appears like a toggle button, which can be toggled to an up or down state.
trans-unit.target: 값은로 설정 하는 경우 `Button`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>위 또는 아래로 상태로 전환할 수 있는 토글 단추 처럼 나타납니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 할당 된 값 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> values and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>'s appearance are automatically changed when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값 가져오거나 설정 여부는 <> </> *> 또는 <> </> *> 값 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref>의 모양을 변경 자동으로 됩니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 를 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If AutoCheck is set to false, you will need to add code to update the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> values in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 여가 false로 설정 하는 경우 업데이트 하는 코드를 추가 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>값에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>이벤트 처리기.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*> value or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> value and the appearance of the control are automatically changed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <> </> *> 값 또는 <> </> *> 값과 컨트롤의 모양에 자동으로 변경의 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> 이벤트, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal and vertical alignment of the check mark on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 확인 표시의 가로 및 세로 맞춤을 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleLeft" name="MiddleLeft" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_MiddleLeft" name="MiddleLeft" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 할당 된 값 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is in the checked state.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값 가져오거나 설정 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 선택된 상태에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the value is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> portion of the control displays a check mark.
trans-unit.target: 값이 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>컨트롤의 부분에 확인 표시가 나타납니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> property is set to `Button`, the control will appear sunken when Checked is `true` and raised like a standard button when `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>속성이 `Button`, 컨트롤이 오목한는 옵션을 선택 하면 나타납니다. `true` 와 같은 표준으로 인해 발생 표시 되 면 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is in the checked state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 체크에 상태가 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the Checked property will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for either a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Indeterminate" name="Indeterminate" href=""></xref><xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <> </> *> 속성이로 설정 되어 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, Checked 속성은 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 하나는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""> </xref> 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Indeterminate" name="Indeterminate" href=""> </xref> <> </> *> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 상태를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property is set to `false`, the CheckState property value can only be set to `CheckState.Indeterminate` in code and not by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>속성이 `false`, CheckState 속성 값 설정할 수 있습니다 `CheckState.Indeterminate` 코드에서 및 사용자 상호 작용이 아니라.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance?displayProperty=fullName> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control in its different states for the `Normal` and `Button` style control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance?displayProperty=fullName>의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>컨트롤에 대 한 여러 상태에는 `Normal` 및 `Button` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 컨트롤의 스타일</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: |CheckState|Appearance.Normal|Appearance.Button| |----------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| |`Checked`|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> displays a check mark.|The control appears sunken.| |`Unchecked`|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> is empty.|The control appears raised.| |`Indeterminate`|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> displays a check mark and is shaded.|The control appears flat.|
trans-unit.target: | CheckState | Appearance.Normal| Appearance.Button| |----------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| | `Checked`| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>확인 표시가 나타납니다. | 컨트롤 오목 하 게 표시 합니다. | | `Unchecked`| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>비어 있습니다. | 컨트롤이 볼록하게 표시 합니다. | | `Indeterminate`| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>확인 표시를 표시 하 고는 음영 처리 됩니다. | 컨트롤이 평면으로 표시 합니다. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unchecked" name="Unchecked" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 할당 된 값 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>속성 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 새로운 액세스 가능성 개체를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: CreateAccessibilityInstance 메서드를 명시적으로 호출 하지 않는 경우 그 때 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>속성이 나 참조.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 가져오거나 설정할는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>속성에 대 한 참조를 추가 해야 합니다는 `Accessibility` 어셈블리는.NET Framework와 함께 설치 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckBoxAccessibleObject> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckBoxAccessibleObject>컨트롤에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckBoxAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 핸들이 만들어지는 경우 필요한 작성 매개 변수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> 컨트롤에 대 한 핸들을 만들 때 필요한 작성 매개 변수를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 기본 크기를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The default size.
trans-unit.target: 기본 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumerations are set to false for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>열거형에 대 한 false로 설정 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>컨트롤과 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 DoubleClick.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는이 클래스와 관련이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bits are set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>스타일 비트가 `false` 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>컨트롤과 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다 MouseDoubleClick.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AppearanceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.AppearanceChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnAppearanceChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAppearanceChanged 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 메서드 변경은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A> property is set to `true`, subsequent clicks of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> will result in OnClick cycling through all the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>속성이 `true`이후의 클릭는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>OnClick의 모든 값을 순환 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>열거형.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, OnClick switches between <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 OnClick <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>하</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> 는 전환 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyUp*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the OnMouseUp event.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseUp 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 니모닉 문자를 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 컨트롤의 니모닉 문자를 처리할 수 있도록 지정 합니다. 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 결정 해야 컨트롤을 니모닉 처리 하는 상태에 있는지 여부와 지정 된 문자를 니모닉 나타내는지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우,이 메서드는 수행 돌아가 니모닉와 연결 된 동작 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 반환 하지, 하면 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 구현에서는 자주 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>메서드를 지정 된 문자는 컨트롤의 텍스트에 니모닉과 일치 하는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 의 기본 구현을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>메서드는 반환 `false` 컨트롤에 니모닉이 없음을 나타내려면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 문자입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤이 문자를 니모닉으로 처리 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트의 맞춤을 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref>&2;가 아닌 상태 세 가지 선택 허용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the ThreeState property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A> property value can only be set to the `Indeterminate` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> in code and not by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: ThreeState 속성이로 설정 된 경우 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>속성 값 설정할 수 있습니다는 `Indeterminate` 값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>코드에서 및 사용자 상호 작용이 아니라.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> is able to display three check states; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 세 가지 선택 상태를 표시할 수 없으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 현재를 나타내는 문자열을 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A string that states the control type and the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 유형과의 상태를 나타내는 문자열의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckState*>
